name: Personal MAL Ratings
description: Overwrites community ratings with your personal MyAnimeList anime ratings
overview: This plugin fetches your personal anime ratings from MyAnimeList and uses them to override the community ratings in Jellyfin for your anime library. Features include OAuth2 authentication, intelligent anime matching, comprehensive logging, and real-time testing tools.

versions.changelog: Enhanced metadata updates with database persistence, comprehensive logging, and web-based testing tools
